amendment.description: To require consideration of the utilization of fuel cells as back-up power systems in Department of Defense operations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4222 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4222 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S6346-6366; text: CR S6349) To require consideration of the utilization of fuel cells as back-up power systems in Department of Defense operations.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4222 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4222 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Bingaman.
